title: Hextech crafting champions
body: I own all the champions in the game except for Kled. If I combine 3 champ shards, am I guaranteed to get Kled?

replies.body: Currently, that is how it should work!  Since it's been some time since Kled has been released, he should be available through Hextech Crafting now.  Nice job grabbing all of the champions!
